english.question: Which article of the Indian Constitution abolishes untouchability?
english.explanation: Article 17 explicitly abolishes untouchability and forbids its practice in any form.

hinglish.question: Bharatiya Samvidhan ka kaun sa anuchhed achhoot pratha ko samapt karta hai?
hinglish.explanation: Anuchhed 17 achhoot pratha ko poorn roop se samapt karta hai.

english.question: Who was the first Chief Election Commissioner of India?
english.explanation: Sukumar Sen served from 1950-1958 and conducted India's first general elections in 1951-52.

hinglish.question: Bharat ka pehla Chief Election Commissioner kaun the?
hinglish.explanation: Sukumar Sen ne 1951-52 mein pehle general elections karaye the.

english.question: Which Indian state has the longest coastline including islands?
english.explanation: Andhra Pradesh has 974 km coastline (mainland) + 357 km (islands), totaling 1,331 km.

hinglish.question: Kis rajya ka samundri tat (islands sahit) sabse lamba hai?
hinglish.explanation: Andhra Pradesh ka kul samundri tat 1,331 km hai (974 km mainland + 357 km islands).

english.question: Which is the only Indian river that flows through a desert?
english.explanation: Luni River originates in Rajasthan and flows through the Thar Desert before ending in Rann of Kutch.

hinglish.question: Bharat ki kaun si nadi ek registan se guzarti hai?
hinglish.explanation: Luni Nadi Rajasthan se nikalkar Thar Registan se guzarti hai.
